Text: Hello! Would you like to buy something?
Actually I want to sell my old sword.
Alright how much do you want for it?
Maybe I want to buy a new one too..
Maybe I want to buy a new one too..
I want to buy the iron sword.
You should take the steel sword, it is of much better quality!
I would like the iron sword.
No, thanks. I'll take the iron sword.
Ill be on my way now. Bye!
